original_text: Amaziah made himself strong to rule his kingdom with authority. Then he killed the officers who had murdered his father, King Joash.
korean_text: 그의 나라가 굳게 서매 그의 부왕을 죽인 신하들을 죽였으나

sentences.original_text: to rule his kingdom with authority
who had murdered his father, King Joash
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 아버지 요아스 왕을 살해하였기 때문이라
